solution_line_template: If Susie puts {percent_increase} more money into her piggy bank, she'll have {percent_increase}*{initial_amount} = $<<{percent_increase}*{initial_amount}={additional_amount}>>{additional_amount} more in her piggy bank.
The total amount of money in Susie's piggy bank will increase to ${initial_amount} + ${additional_amount} = $<<{initial_amount}+{additional_amount}={total_amount}>>{total_amount}
